description: Are you freaking kidding me? How is this guy still free to walk the streets? He just openly stated how to maim children at the very least.  What kind of world are we allowing to be created when someone like this is allowed to make such statements? A doctor would never never be allowed to make such criminal statements.  So why is a NON-doctor, NON-researcher, UNeducated, UNlicensed, billionaire allowed to make such objectionable comments?  Without ANY blowback??? WITHOUT ANY CENSORSHIP??? Without any ramifications?  Without any consequence?  For GOD’s sake, what exactly do we need to hear or see before  we say “enough is enough”? What price do we have to pay in the lives of innocent children before we finally get rid of this pathetic excuse of a human trash (no insult to human trash)?! He’s allowed to get away with this why?  Because he has money? Because he has the WHO and the CDC in his pockets? WAKE UP PEOPLE!!! Wake up before it’s TOO late!  Part 6 Covid 19 Conspiracy? Coming in 4 parts this week!!! Visit YouTube.com/DrButtar to watch.
